explains: adj. 依照情况的；详细的，详尽的；偶然的
wordGroup: circumstantial evidence 间接证据；旁证

sentences.en: The case against him was largely circumstantial.
sentences.cn: 对他不利的案情大多为间接推测的。

sentences.en: The evidence against him was purely circumstantial.
sentences.cn: 不利于他的证据纯粹是间接证据。

sentences.en: Their problems were circumstantial rather than personal.
sentences.cn: 他们的困难是环境而非个人所致。
